alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Dauphin; Franklin; Lancaster; Lebanon; Perry; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 27 at 3:43AM EDT until July 28 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Maximum heat index from 100 to 105 expected. * WHERE...Franklin, Perry, Dauphin, Lebanon, Cumberland, Adams, York and Lancaster Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 8 PM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Maximum heat index could exceed 105 degrees Friday afternoon. A heat advisory may also be needed for Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay out of the sun, and stay in an air-conditioned room. Check up on relatives and neighbors, and provide pets with adequate water and shelter from the sun. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Consider rescheduling strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. For additional excessive heat safety information, visit weather.gov/safety/heat.
